channel.title: How to post pic susing html or in another word [img][/img]
channel.description: hi i watned to pst ics using html i do click on that picture thing but i dont see what to do next to post the pics i need this for moparescape and other places like fomrues and all other places please answer me i dont want to use phtotbucket anyways plz dont put stupid commands like thats stupid just answer me if you can thnak you [img][/img]

item.title: How to post pic susing html or in another word [img][/img]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

In your website edit your html.

Add

<img src="yourwebsite.com/yourpic.imgtype">

EX:

<img src="http://www.moparisthebest.com/dlmoparscape.png">

Read full topic
